Reviews.Title: amazing!!
Reviews.Author: sheri
Reviews.Content: I'm a professional photographer and honestly it doesn't matter If you have a 1,500 dollar camera or a point and shoot Its all about you as the photographer. This camera shoots like a pro and it brings so much creativity to your fingertips... The shutter in incredibly fast and the live filters are so cool, its like having a mini Photoshop everywhere you go!Im so happy I invested in the camera for sure..
